modShortDescription: This server side modlet adds pushable shopping carts & tilt trucks to the game. Additional it changes and expand the existing storage opportunities.
modDescription:
This server side modlet adds pushable shopping carts & tilt trucks to the game. Additional it changes and expand the existing [storage](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-storage/) opportunities up to 13 locked and 77 unlocked plus some new furnitures. By default the storage size is very small but it can be changed with the extra modlet inside (zStorage(Big)).

When downloading, make sure to pull the folder that contains a modinfo.xml into your mods folder and not the master!

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Localization Update
* Hotfix – Missing “zStorage (Big)” added
